snippet: Armenia’s foreign minister, Edward Nalbandian, condemned Turkey over its angry responses to global acknowledgments that the killings of ethnic Armenians by Ottoman Turks 100 years ago were genocide.
abstract: Armenian Foreign Min Edward Nalbandian criticizes Turkey for denying that killings of ethnic Armenians by Ottoman Turks 100 years ago was genocide.
lead_paragraph: Armenia’s foreign minister, Edward Nalbandian, condemned Turkey over its angry responses to global acknowledgments that the killings of ethnic Armenians by Ottoman Turks 100 years ago were genocide.

headline.main: Armenia Official Criticizes Turkey for Genocide Denial
headline.print_headline: Armenia Official Criticizes Turkey for Genocide Denial

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
